title: How to Play As Luigi in Super Mario Galaxy

steps.title: Defeat Bowser for the last time in the center of the universe.
steps.content: Defeat Bowser for the last time in the center of the universe. You must have 60 or more stars to do this. Don't worry, it would not be gone forever!

steps.title: After doing this.
steps.content: After doing this. a new number will appear on the floor next to Rosalina. If you do this AT 60 stars, at 61, the number would say, "59".

steps.title: Collect the rest of the Stars (there are 120 stars to collect) so that the number next to Rosalina is 0 again.
steps.content: Collect the rest of the Stars (there are 120 stars to collect) so that the number next to Rosalina is 0 again.

steps.title: After getting all of the Stars, talk to Rosalina and ask to fight Bowser again.
steps.content: After getting all of the Stars, talk to Rosalina and ask to fight Bowser again.

steps.title: After the credits, you will get a message saying that Luigi is now a playable character.
steps.content: After the credits, you will get a message saying that Luigi is now a playable character.

steps.title: Now you will be able to play as Luigi!
steps.content: Now you will be able to play as Luigi! Caution: When you just got Luigi, the star count would drop to zero on Luigi so you can do it all over with Luigi!
